data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Enshi Tujia and Miao that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Enshi Tujia and Miao, Hubei, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Enshi Tujia and Miao, Hubei, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Enshi Tujia and Miao with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Enshi Tujia and Miao, Hubei, China to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Miao, Enshi people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 37,604 believers in Enshi Tujia and Miao, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 458,096 lost in Enshi Tujia and Miao that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.focus_label: Enshi Tujia and Miao, Hubei, China

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Enshi Tujia and Miao, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

location.name: Enshi Tujia and Miao
location.full_name: Enshi Tujia and Miao, Hubei, China
